name: loom-js

scripts.e2e:browser: yarn proto && yarn abi && tsc && webpack --config webpack.e2e.test.config.js | tap-spec
scripts.e2e:node: yarn proto && yarn abi && tsc && tape -r dotenv/config dotenv_config_path=./.env.test dist/tests/e2e_tests.js | tap-spec
scripts.e2e:plasma-cash:honest: yarn proto && yarn abi && yarn copy-contracts && tsc && yarn tape && tape -r dotenv/config dotenv_config_path=./.env.test dist/tests/e2e/plasma-cash/test-honest-operator.js | tap-spec
scripts.e2e:plasma-cash:hostile: yarn proto && yarn abi && yarn copy-contracts && tsc && yarn tape && tape -r dotenv/config dotenv_config_path=./.env.test dist/tests/e2e/plasma-cash/test-hostile-operator.js | tap-spec
scripts.prepublish: yarn proto && yarn abi && yarn build && webpack
scripts.test:browser: yarn proto && yarn abi && tsc && webpack --config webpack.unit.tests.config.js | tap-spec
scripts.test:node: yarn proto && yarn abi && tsc && tape dist/tests/unit_tests.js | tap-spec
